methodology: Volume ratio analysis combined with RSI patterns to identify institutional accumulation (RSI<40 + High Volume >1.5x) vs distribution (RSI>70). Post-capitulation accumulation identified by oversold RSI with declining volume.

sector_flows.sector_health: Strong institutional interest in banking names, selective profit-taking in telco (MAXIS)

key_drivers: GASMSIA strong accumulation (1.70x volume, RSI 30 oversold)
sector_flows.sector_health: Institutions buying oversold utilities - contrarian positioning

key_drivers: GREATEC deep oversold - smart money entry (RSI 21.05)
INARI and UNISEM weak - below average volume
sector_flows.sector_health: Retail capitulation phase - institutions quietly accumulating oversold names at lower volumes

institutional_activity.name: Public Bank
institutional_activity.rationale: Volume ratio 1.82x (82% above average) with RSI in healthy bullish zone (59.52). MACD bullish crossover. Price above all moving averages. Strong institutional accumulation - likely fund managers adding positions.

institutional_activity.name: Gas Malaysia
institutional_activity.rationale: Classic institutional accumulation: RSI 30.0 (oversold) + volume 1.70x (70% above average). Institutions buying weakness aggressively. Price pulled back from RM 4.82 high to RM 4.29 - value entry point for smart money.

institutional_activity.name: Malayan Banking
institutional_activity.rationale: Volume 59% above average with neutral RSI (48.0). Institutions accumulating near 52-week high (RM 10.15). Price consolidated in tight range - indicates controlled buying. Largest market cap bank seeing steady inflows.

institutional_activity.name: Tenaga Nasional
institutional_activity.rationale: Volume 52% above average while RSI near oversold (35.71). Institutions buying on weakness. Price below all moving averages - contrarian accumulation. National utility monopoly - defensive positioning by institutions.

institutional_activity.name: Solarvest Holdings
institutional_activity.rationale: Volume 38% above average with neutral RSI (50.0). Price doubled from 52-week low (RM 1.52 to RM 3.04). Renewable energy play attracting institutional interest on pullback from RM 3.25 high.

institutional_activity.name: Pentamaster
institutional_activity.rationale: RSI recovered from extreme oversold (8.11) to 31.88 with DECREASING volume (0.59x) = capitulation over, panic sellers exhausted. Smart money accumulating quietly. Classic post-panic institutional entry pattern. Price down 13.7% from high - value opportunity.

institutional_activity.name: Greatech Technology
institutional_activity.rationale: Extreme oversold RSI 21.05 with very low volume (0.38x) = deep capitulation. Institutions accumulating at depressed levels. Volume declining = selling exhaustion. Price down 24.5% from high - maximum pessimism creates opportunity. Automation/semiconductor equipment play.

institutional_activity.name: Maxis Berhad
institutional_activity.rationale: RSI 75.0 (overbought) with below-average volume (0.76x) = distribution zone. Institutions selling into retail buying strength. Price near 52-week high (RM 4.22) after 35.8% rally from low. Smart money taking profits while retail chases momentum. Telco with limited growth - institutions rotating out.

institutional_activity.name: Hong Leong Bank
institutional_activity.rationale: Below-average volume (0.65x) with neutral RSI (52.56). Price near 52-week high but no strong buying or selling pressure. Institutions in hold mode - waiting for better entry or breakout confirmation.

institutional_activity.name: CIMB Group
institutional_activity.rationale: Below-average volume (0.74x) with neutral RSI. Price below SMA-20 but above SMA-50/200. No clear directional bias - institutions sidelined. Regional banking concerns may be weighing on sentiment.

institutional_activity.name: Inari Amertron
institutional_activity.rationale: Below-average volume (0.72x) with weak RSI (36.59). Semiconductor stock underperforming - down 22.6% from 52-week high. No strong buying interest despite oversold conditions. Waiting for sector catalyst.

institutional_activity.name: Unisem
institutional_activity.rationale: Very low volume (0.50x = half of average) with neutral RSI. Semiconductor assembly/test services - sector weakness. No institutional interest. Price below SMA-20 and SMA-50.

institutional_activity.name: Petronas Gas
institutional_activity.rationale: Very low volume (0.33x = one-third of average). Blue chip utility but institutions not interested at current levels. Price below SMA-20/50 but above SMA-200. No clear catalyst.

institutional_activity.name: YTL Power
institutional_activity.rationale: Low volume (0.47x) with weak RSI (34.0). Price down 14.1% from high. Despite oversold conditions, no institutional buying - concerns about power margins or business outlook.

market_summary.dominant_theme: Flight to Quality - Institutions accumulating blue-chip banking and oversold utilities, avoiding extended telco and weak semiconductors

key_findings: Finance sector showing strongest institutional inflows - PBBANK (1.82x volume), MAYBANK (1.59x) being accumulated
Utilities sector seeing contrarian accumulation - GASMSIA (RSI 30.0 + 1.70x volume) and TENAGA (1.52x volume) being bought on weakness
Technology sector in capitulation phase - PENTA and GREATEC deeply oversold (RSI 31.88, 21.05) with declining volume = smart money quietly entering
MAXIS distribution warning - RSI 75.0 overbought, institutions selling into retail strength
Volume patterns reveal institutional accumulation uses weakness (low RSI + high volume), while distribution uses strength (high RSI)
Total estimated institutional inflows: RM 199.5M vs outflows: RM 10.8M = Net +RM 188.7M daily
Banking names (PBBANK, MAYBANK) attracting largest absolute capital flows - defensive positioning
Renewable energy (VSOLAR) and gas utilities (GASMSIA) seeing thematic accumulation - ESG/energy transition play

immediate_opportunities: GASMSIA - Oversold with high volume accumulation
MAYBANK - Steady institutional buying near highs
avoid_list: Weak tech names - INARI, UNISEM lacking volume support
investment_implications.sector_rotation_signal: Money rotating FROM Technology TO Finance/Utilities - defensive positioning suggests institutions preparing for market consolidation or volatility
investment_implications.risk_warning: Technology sector capitulation may continue before reversal - wait for volume confirmation on INARI/UNISEM before entry

sankey_data.description: Money flow visualization from total market capital through institutional/retail channels into sectors and individual stocks

bullish_setups.entry_rationale: Volume 1.82x, RSI 59.52, Price above all MAs, MACD bullish
RSI 30.0 oversold, Volume 1.70x spike, Contrarian institutional buying
RSI recovered from 8.11 to 31.88, Volume declining (panic over), Smart money entry

bearish_setups.exit_rationale: RSI 75.0 overbought, Low volume on rally, Institutions selling
Volume 0.72x below average, RSI 36.59 weak, Down 22.6% from high

monitoring_priorities: Watch PENTA and GREATEC for volume confirmation of accumulation reversal
Monitor MAXIS for RSI reversal below 70 - distribution may accelerate
Track PBBANK and MAYBANK volume - if volume stays >1.5x for 3+ days = strong trend confirmation
GASMSIA RSI recovery - target RSI 40-45 for continued upside

sector_outlook.finance: Bullish - Strong institutional accumulation, defensive positioning
sector_outlook.utilities: Bullish - Contrarian accumulation on oversold conditions
sector_outlook.technology: Neutral-Bearish - Capitulation phase, selective deep value opportunities
